players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead so suddenly. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we can trust everyone in this game."
Bob: "Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we can trust everyone in this game. I agree with Diana, it is strange that Charlie was found dead so suddenly."

Diana: "I'm concerned about the sudden death of Charlie and I think it's important that we all work together to ensure trust in this game. Let's keep an open dialogue and share any information we have."
You: "I think we should investigate Diana further, as they were the one who was discovered to be the mafioso last night. We can't just blindly trust them after what happened."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
